signin.title: Logg inn
signin.serverErrorText: The har oppstått en feil med innloggingen.
signin.returnUserLabel: Forrige gang logget du inn med...
signin.domainUserLabel: You are connected from your corporate network...
signin.popupCredentials: Fyll inn detaljene dine i sprettopp vinduet
signin.userClosedPopup: Sprettopp vinduet ble lukket. Prøv igjen.
signin.userConsentFailed: Tilgang ble ikke godkjent. Prøv igjen.

signup.title: Registrer deg
signup.headerText: Vennligst fyll inn brukernavn og passord
signup.enterpriseEmailWarningText: This domain {domain} has been configured for Single Sign On and you can't create an account. Try signing in instead.
signup.serverErrorText: There was an error processing the sign up.

reset.title: Reset Password
reset.successText: We've just sent you an email to reset your password.
reset.headerText: Please enter your email and the new password. We will send you an email to confirm the password change.
reset.serverErrorText: There was an error processing the reset password.
